tabs-to-spaces.configDescription: Set the tab width (tab stop interval) for conversion.
tabs-to-spaces.leadingOnlyDescription: Only convert spaces at the beginning of lines. When disabled, converts all spaces that align with tab stops.
tabs-to-spaces.spacesToTabsDescription: Convert spaces to tabs at tab stop boundaries.
tabs-to-spaces.tabsToSpacesDescription: Convert tab characters to spaces based on tab stop semantics.
